channel.title: Abouts on Kashish Patel
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Kashish Patel

item.title: About
item.description: #What I Do I’m a technologist comfortable working cross-functionally. I have taken on roles on teams ranging from project management, product management, ops, and (primarily) software engineering with a focus on the backend. #Achievements I graduated from Duke in 3 years while completing three different courses of study (Computer Science, Finance, Decision Sciences) and being only a part-time student my final semester. I’ve held engineering positions at high-growth startups, a multinational conglomerate, and at the world’s largest hedge fund.
